casebody.data:
Philip J. SKRZAT
v.
Michael CONNEARNEY & Another.1 17-P-1602 Appeals Court of Massachusetts. Entered: March 4, 2019

The order entered November 21, 2016, denying the motion for leave to amend answer and file a third-party complaint is vacated, and the matter is remanded for further proceedings consistent with the memorandum and order of the Appeals Court.
